text:
Hi!!
Any news about the Marketing / Forms API V3?
Thx in advance!!
Hey <@U03N6BVTY81> not yet, I would love any help on this!
If you want to email me directly, <mailto:laura@orendatech.com|laura@orendatech.com> <@U03N6BVTY81>

Hello everyone! I'm having a problem with the HubSpot API as of today, as it won't allow me to link my HubSpot account to my app and it keeps loading without giving a response. It seems that the problem is in the function api_client.auth.oauth.tokens_api.create_token(), because I receive the code in the URL but when it has to create the token it never creates it and throws an 'EXPIRED_AUTH_CODE' error. I have not made any changes to the code and yesterday everything worked perfectly. I have checked that the HubSpot servers are up and running and they are. Any help or someone who is experiencing the same?

:wave: Hello, team! I have a query regarding engagement api.
I am calling the engagement api for updating contact activity from my application. In the request, I'm sending disposition, recordingUrl, etc. as metadata. Is there a way such that I could show that metadata as contact properties in contacts table?
I am migrating HubSpot API from api key to private app all API is working fine but one API showing scope missing error after allowed this permission
